title: A Kiss In the Rain
description: A love lost. Danielle Cotton is sent to her grandmother in disgrace where she withdraws from life. Content where she is, she's devastated when her grandmother dies and she's forced to move back to her hometown with her daughter. While there, she mets Adeline, sixty years her senior who drags her back to the living world with gentle nudges and out and out bossiness. She reconnects with her family and soon discovers the love lost isn't as lost as she'd thought.Every woman ... mother, grandmother, friend ... deserves love in her life. Love and friendship.Available for Kindle on Amazon!
author: Dacia Wilkinson
